song.englishname: My Mom Still Cleans My Room

english.segment1: I'm not always nice, not always mean. My room has never been seen clean. The way I feel is not always how I seem
english.segment2: The thoughts that form inside my brain. Don't always seem to entertain. 'Cause when I tell my company. They think there's something wrong with me
english.segment3: You don't know me like you think you do. You don't understand me and it's true
english.segment4: I'm getting older day by day. Ain't got time to get to everything. Hold on tight, enjoy the ride. Life is short, so live it wisely
english.segment5: I'm not always sick, but often tired. Sometimes I'm having fun or wired. I don't have someone to call my own
english.segment6: I'm not full of all the answers. I guess that I'm an o.k. dancer. I just want to be left alone.
